Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at V Hotel Bencoolen in Singapore (Colonial District - Beach Road), you'll be minutes from Singapore Management University and National Museum of Singapore. This hotel is within close proximity of Peranakan Museum and Plaza Singapura.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 272 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of V Hotel Bencoolen, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of V Hotel Bencoolen, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

With a stay at V Hotel Bencoolen in Singapore (Colonial District - Beach Road), you'll be minutes from Singapore Management University and National Museum of Singapore. This hotel is within close proximity of Peranakan Museum and Plaza Singapura.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Singapore Management University - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Singapore Art Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
The Cathay - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kwan Im Thong Hood Cho Temple - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kwan Im Thong Hood Cho - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
National Museum of Singapore - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
National Library Board Singapore - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
CHIJMES - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bras Basah Complex - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bugis Street Shopping District - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bugis Junction Shopping Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Peranakan Museum - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Park Mall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Sim Lim Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Battle Box - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for V Hotel Bencoolen is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 16.6 km / 10.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
